name: uniubi-lib-mobile-demo
description: 移动端组件库 demo 项目

scripts.build:h5: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=dev taro build --type h5
scripts.build:h5:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=test taro build --type h5
scripts.build:h5:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=release taro build --type h5
scripts.build:h5:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=pre taro build --type h5
scripts.build:h5:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=production taro build --type h5
scripts.build:weapp: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=dev taro build --type weapp
scripts.build:weapp:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=test taro build --type weapp
scripts.build:weapp:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=release taro build --type weapp
scripts.build:weapp:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=pre taro build --type weapp
scripts.build:weapp:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=production taro build --type weapp

author: xuxiu <zhangming@uni-ubi.com>
